objects.text:
Premium 2-Piece Matte Black Design
Durable Metal With Rust-Resistant Coating
Space-Saving Vertical Storage Solution
Contemporary Style For Modern Kitchens

product_details.name: Modern Kitchen Utensil Organizer Set - Stylish Black Storage Solutions
product_details.description:
• Premium 2-piece kitchen utensil holder set in elegant matte black finish
• Large capacity main holder with ventilation holes for proper air circulation
• Complementary smaller holder perfect for silverware and dining utensils
• Durable metal construction with rust-resistant coating
• Contemporary design that complements any kitchen décor
• Easy-to-clean surface and dishwasher-safe utensil holders
• Space-saving vertical storage solution for cooking tools
• Perfect height for easy access to frequently used kitchen tools
• Stable base design prevents tipping and spills
• Includes holes for hanging options (wall-mounting capability)

banner_details:
This banner features a dark, modern design showcasing a kitchen utensil set. The background utilizes layered, softly-stroked abstract geometric shapes and borders, creating depth and visual interest. At the top, the bold headline (id: "heading") creates a strong brand presence. Just below, a sleek subheading (id: "subheading") offers a refined touch with lighter gray tones. A concise product description (id: "description") is neatly aligned on the left, emphasizing key features. The price tag (id: "price") is prominently displayed in large white type, catching immediate attention. A call-to-action button (rect id: "cta_button", text id: "cta") in a bright blue hue anchors the design. The product image (id: "product_image") on the right provides visual balance and highlights the product.

**Color Palette:**
- Charcoal Black: #282828
- Slate Gray: #404040
- Soft Gray: #CCCCCC
- White: #FFFFFF
- Accent Blue: #4A90E2
- Light Gray Text: #A0A0A0
product_color: The product image showcases a modern kitchen utensil set with a sleek, minimalist aesthetic. The dominant colors are matte charcoal gray (#3C3F41) in the utensils, paired with deep black (#101010) metal holders that offer a premium, professional look. Accents of natural wood at the utensil handles (#C89F76) add warmth and contrast. The metallic shine of the cutlery (#B0B0B0) introduces reflective highlights, blending seamlessly with the darker tones. These colors are harmoniously blended, providing visual depth while ensuring each element is distinctly visible. A fitting advertisement palette: Charcoal Gray (#3C3F41), Deep Black (#101010), Warm Wood (#C89F76), and Sleek Silver (#B0B0B0).
